content: Hello Mark, Thank you for this article! I actually quoted you in an article that I wrote. (If you want to see, it’s at https://www.achieveit.com/blog/success-strategies-for-failing-up/.) No need to share if you don’t want to, I just know I hate it when people talk about me behind my back, so I thought I’d let you know I was talking about you. Thank you again for your help — even if you didn’t know you were helping. Sincerely, Ashley Shaw
